translation.en: [man, in Zulu] God has plans.
translation.it: Dio ha dei piani.

translation.en: Life is tricky.
translation.it: La vita è complicata.

translation.en: It is unpredictable and hard to understand. Things don't always happen the way we want them to.
translation.it: È imprevedibile e difficile da capire. Non sempre va come vorremmo.

translation.en: And that's okay with me.
translation.it: E va bene così.

translation.en: [woman 1, in English] Senzo Meyiwa,
translation.it: Senzo Meyiwa,

translation.en: the 27-year-old captain and goalkeeper of the South African national football team,
translation.it: il ventisettenne capitano e portiere della nazionale di calcio sudafricana,

translation.en: has been shot and killed.
translation.it: è stato ucciso a colpi di pistola.

translation.en: [man 1, echoing] A national tragedy.
translation.it: UNA DOCUSERIE NETFLIX Una tragedia nazionale.

translation.en: For me, this is a national tragedy.
translation.it: È una vera tragedia nazionale.

translation.en: -[sirens] -[woman 2] Soccer star Senzo Meyiwa,
translation.it: Senzo Meyiwa, la stella del calcio,

translation.en: murdered in an apparent robbery at his girlfriend's home.
translation.it: è stato ucciso durante una rapina nella casa della compagna.

translation.en: [woman 3] …shot dead at the Vosloorus home of singer Kelly Khumalo.
translation.it: È stato assassinato nella casa della cantante Kelly Khumalo.

translation.en: [woman 4] I am one person who thrives in her truth.
translation.it: Sono una persona trasparente.

translation.en: And I also believe that if you own your truth, no one can use it against you.
translation.it: E sono convinta che se dici la verità, nessuno potrà usarla contro di te.

translation.en: [woman 1] Police say he was in a house with seven other people when it happened.
translation.it: Era in casa con altre 7 persone al momento del fatto. IN CASA IL GIORNO DELL'OMICIDIO

translation.en: If it's more than a robbery that went wrong, what can it be?
translation.it: Se non è una rapina finita male, cosa può essere?

translation.en: [man 2] Senzo's life is like a safe, where you go inside it and then you find another safe
translation.it: La vita di Senzo è come una cassaforte in cui entri e trovi un'altra cassaforte

translation.en: and another safe… [chuckles]
translation.it: e un'altra cassaforte…

translation.en: Police now say it was a hit.
translation.it: La polizia parla di premeditazione.

translation.en: [man 3] This was an assassination.
translation.it: Si trattò di omicidio.

translation.en: The robbery was a cover-up.
translation.it: La rapina era finta.

translation.en: [woman 5] Why would you kill your husband?
translation.it: Perché uccidere tuo marito?

translation.en: Why? For what?
translation.it: Perché? Per cosa?

translation.en: [man 4] People like Kelly might help to solve this case.
translation.it: Kelly potrebbe aiutare a risolvere questo caso.

translation.en: People like Longwe, they're not saying anything.
translation.it: Longwe non dirà una parola.

translation.en: [chanting, in Zulu] Kelly is a dog! Kelly is a dog!
translation.it: Kelly è una bastarda!

translation.en: [in English] After six years, police finally arrested
translation.it: Dopo sei anni, la polizia ha arrestato diverse persone sospettate dell'omicidio.

translation.en: several suspects they believe are behind the murder.
translation.it: la polizia ha arrestato diverse persone sospettate dell'omicidio.

translation.en: [man 5, in Zulu] They are hitmen and they kill, but I know they're not involved in Senzo's case.
translation.it: Sono killer, ma non sono coinvolti nel caso di Senzo.

translation.en: [man 6, in Zulu] The people in the house are hiding something.
translation.it: Chi si trovava in casa nasconde qualcosa.

translation.en: The truth always comes out.
translation.it: La verità viene sempre a galla.

translation.en: [man 7, in English] We've lost a captain. We've lost a father, a brother, a friend.
translation.it: Abbiamo perso un capitano, un padre, un fratello, un amico.

translation.en: [woman 6, in Zulu] Everyone who was in that house… and I mean everyone, they know who killed my child.
translation.it: Tutti quelli che erano in quella casa sanno chi ha ucciso mio figlio.

translation.en: [crying] Why did my child leave me?
translation.it: Perché mio figlio mi ha abbandonata?

translation.en: [woman 3, in English] The Bafana Bafana and Orlando Pirates captain
translation.it: Il capitano dei Bafana Bafana e del Pirates

translation.en: was shot dead at the Vosloorus home of singer Kelly Khumalo.
translation.it: è stato ucciso nella casa della cantante Kelly Khumalo.

translation.en: [man] The national football captain was visiting his girlfriend, who is a well-known musician in her own right.
translation.it: Il capitano era andato a trovare la sua compagna, una nota musicista.

translation.en: The couple have a seven-month-old daughter together.
translation.it: La coppia ha una figlia di sette mesi.

translation.en: [man, in English] Late that night, I received a call from
translation.it: Quella notte, ricevetti una telefonata

translation.en: the provincial commissioner responsible for the detectives,
translation.it: dal commissario provinciale responsabile dei detective

translation.en: and he informed me that, um…
translation.it: che mi informò che il portiere dei Bafana Bafana, Senzo Meyiwa, era stato ucciso.

translation.en: Bafana Bafana's goalkeeper Senzo Meyiwa has been gunned down.
translation.it: che il portiere dei Bafana Bafana, Senzo Meyiwa, era stato ucciso.

translation.en: -Me and my team, we rushed to the scene. -[siren wailing]
translation.it: Io e la mia squadra ci precipitammo sulla scena.

translation.en: There were many people outside the yard and inside the yard.
translation.it: C'erano molte persone all'esterno e all'interno del cortile.

translation.en: The duty officer on standby was there from the local detectives.
translation.it: L'agente in servizio della polizia locale era lì in attesa.

translation.en: And I also found the MEC for Public Safety.
translation.it: C'era anche un membro del Comitato di Pubblica Sicurezza.

translation.en: Then we cleared the scene, and together we sat inside in the house
translation.it: Sgomberammo la scena e ci sedemmo all'interno della casa

translation.en: to interview the family as to what happened.
translation.it: per interrogare la famiglia sull'accaduto.

translation.en: People in the house saying that it was a robbery that went wrong.
translation.it: La gente in casa diceva che era stata una rapina finita male.

translation.en: [in English] Unfortunately, Senzo tried to protect Kelly
translation.it: Senzo ha cercato di proteggere Kelly,

translation.en: because one of the guys was pointing a firearm,
translation.it: perché avevano puntato un'arma,

translation.en: a gun, at-- at Kelly,
translation.it: una pistola, contro Kelly,

translation.en: and when he did that, they-- they shot him from the back.
translation.it: ma gli hanno sparato alle spalle.

translation.en: [Sibiya] As they explained what happened, they were in the house and two people came in.
translation.it: Secondo il loro racconto, due persone entrarono mentre loro erano in casa.

translation.en: And then Senzo tried to jump on one as they were robbing them,
translation.it: Senzo cercò di aggredirne una, mentre venivamo rapinati,

translation.en: and then they shot at him.
translation.it: e loro gli spararono.

translation.en: [man, in English] My phone started going crazy.
translation.it: UNA GRANDE PERDITA PER IL CALCIO Il mio telefono impazzì. #RIPOSIINPACESENZOMEYIWA

translation.en: They were talking about being at Kelly's house, drama, guns being drawn.
translation.it: Erano a casa di Kelly, ci fu una tragedia, una sparatoria.

translation.en: There was something about a break-in, but what did they take?
translation.it: Ci fu una rapina, ma cosa avevano preso?

translation.en: They just took his life away.
translation.it: Solo la sua vita.

translation.en: But why him, if there's a room full of people?
translation.it: Ma perché proprio lui tra tutte quelle persone?

translation.en: You know, stories that weren't really making sense.
translation.it: Quelle storie non erano molto convincenti.

translation.en: What was the motive, you know?
translation.it: Qual era il movente?

translation.en: Because here's a football player who…
translation.it: Parliamo di un giocatore

translation.en: was either fighting to win with his club…
translation.it: che combatteva per vincere con la sua squadra,

translation.en: …or had a big broad smile, who was loved by the fans.
translation.it: che sorrideva sempre e che i fan adoravano.

translation.en: Senzo was at the height of his career when he passed away.
translation.it: Quando morì, Senzo era all'apice della sua carriera.

translation.en: [Thomas Mlambo] Just tell us your name, your position, and how long you've been at the club.
translation.it: Dicci il tuo nome, il tuo ruolo e da quanto tempo sei nella squadra.

translation.en: Ah, my name is Senzo Meyiwa, Orlando Pirates goalkeeper,
translation.it: Mi chiamo Senzo Meyiwa, sono il portiere dell'Orlando Pirates

translation.en: and I've been ten years at Orlando Pirates.
translation.it: e sono nell'Orlando Pirates da dieci anni.

translation.en: [Thomas] For ten years?
translation.it: Dieci anni?

translation.en: [Mark Gleeson] Header!
translation.it: Colpo di testa!

translation.en: And Meyiwa saves.
translation.it: E Meyiwa la para.

translation.en: And that game in the rain was arguably the best I had seen him play…
translation.it: Quella partita sotto la pioggia, fu la migliore che avesse mai giocato…

translation.en: given the conditions.
translation.it: nonostante le condizioni.

translation.en: You know when you say people are playing the game of their lives?
translation.it: Avete presente l'espressione "giocare la partita della vita?"

translation.en: He was playing the game of his life.
translation.it: Stava giocando la partita della vita.

translation.en: Although we did not know that it was going to be the last game of his life.
translation.it: Anche se non sapevamo che sarebbe stata l'ultima.

translation.en: [Gleeson] Lots of movement in the box. Dolly goes for the goal!
translation.it: C'è movimento in area. Dolly va in porta!

translation.en: Meyiwa makes a very good save again.
translation.it: Meyiwa fa un'ottima parata.

translation.en: [Brian Mathe] He's an experienced goalkeeper.
translation.it: È un portiere esperto.

translation.en: He goes for safety. Didn't try to catch the ball outright.
translation.it: Va sul sicuro. Non ha cercato di afferrare la palla.

translation.en: Good shot, as well. Very intriguing.
translation.it: UMLAZI, KWAZULU-NATAL, SUDAFRICA

translation.en: [Gleeson] He really gave it pace at the end there.
translation.it: LA NOTTE DELL'OMICIDIO CASA DEI GENITORI DI SENZO

translation.en: [Senzo's mother, in Zulu] We didn't watch Senzo when he played soccer.
translation.it: Non guardavamo Senzo quando giocava una partita.

translation.en: His father would always watch the next day.
translation.it: Il padre lo guardava il giorno dopo.

translation.en: I asked his father to call and tell him we were watching.
translation.it: Chiesi al padre di dirgli che lo stavamo guardando

translation.en: His father sent a message saying, "Senzo, we are watching you here."
translation.it: e lui gli inviò un messaggio.

translation.en: After each game, his father would text him and advise him on his mistakes.
translation.it: MADRE DI SENZO Dopo ogni partita, il padre lo chiamava per dargli dei consigli.

translation.en: His dream was to play for Pirates and God granted him that wish.
translation.it: Il suo sogno era giocare per il Pirates e Dio glielo concesse.

translation.en: He loved Pirates so much. He really loved Pirates.
translation.it: Adorava tantissimo il Pirates.

translation.en: When they lost a game he would cry.
translation.it: Quando perdeva una partita, piangeva.

translation.en: So, I asked his father, "Has he not responded yet?"
translation.it: Chiesi al padre: "Non ha ancora risposto?"

translation.en: He said, "No, not yet." I said, "He will answer."
translation.it: Lui disse: "No, non ancora". Io dissi: "Risponderà".

translation.en: I don't know how people found out. They just started arriving.
translation.it: Non so come l'avesse scoperto, ma la gente cominciò a presentarsi.

translation.en: [crying] It was really tough.
translation.it: Fu davvero dura.

translation.en: When he died, I also died.
translation.it: Quel giorno, morii anch'io insieme a lui.

translation.en: I remember him sitting on my bed. My old, broken bed.
translation.it: Ricordo che si sedeva sul mio letto vecchio e rotto

translation.en: He said, "Mom, I will buy you a bed."
translation.it: e mi diceva: "Ti comprerò un letto".

translation.en: Senzo would support us. We would eat, there was nothing he didn't do for us.
translation.it: Senzo ci sosteneva. Avevamo da mangiare, avrebbe fatto di tutto per noi.

translation.en: Why did my child leave me?
translation.it: Perché mio figlio mi ha abbandonata?

translation.en: Today, I cry alone.
translation.it: Oggi, piango da sola.

translation.en: [woman 1, in English] We now cross live to our reporter
translation.it: Diamo la parola al nostro reporter

translation.en: who's at the family home at Umlazi in Durban.
translation.it: che si trova a casa della famiglia a Umlazi, Durban.

translation.en: [reporter] His mother has been unable, really, to accept the news,
translation.it: La madre non è riuscita a sopportare la notizia

translation.en: as she was then rushed off to hospital, of course, as she got the news in the early hours of this morning.
translation.it: ed è stata portata d'urgenza in ospedale. Aveva appreso la notizia questa mattina.

translation.en: His siblings are inside, his father is also here.
translation.it: I suoi fratelli e il padre sono all'interno.

translation.en: -[singing] -♪ Rest in peace, Senzo Meyiwa! ♪
translation.it: Senzo Meyiwa!

translation.en: [woman 1] Although Senzo Meyiwa's death is a tragic loss,
translation.it: Anche se la morte di Senzo Meyiwa è una tragica perdita,

translation.en: fans of Orlando Pirates in Umlazi are determined to celebrate his life.
translation.it: i fan dell'Orlando Pirates di Umlazi commemorano la sua vita.

translation.en: Irvin Khoza, the club's head, personally paid his respects at Meyiwa's home.
translation.it: Irvin Khoza, il presidente della squadra, ha reso i suoi omaggi ai Meyiwa.

translation.en: [in English] Why Senzo?
translation.it: Perché Senzo?

translation.en: If that question can be answered, I'd be the happiest person.
translation.it: Se ci fosse una risposta, sarei molto felice.

translation.en: To give a full report to the father,
translation.it: La devo al padre,

translation.en: because he gave the boy to me when he was only 14 years old.
translation.it: perché me lo affidò quando aveva 14 anni.

translation.en: [Khoza] In this place where we are, it's Umlazi.
translation.it: Ci troviamo a Umlazi.

translation.en: These places were the dumping grounds by apartheid,
translation.it: Qui ci relegarono durante l'apartheid

translation.en: for us not to make it in life.
translation.it: affinché non ce la facessimo.

translation.en: But people like Senzo Meyiwa emerged from this township,
translation.it: Ma le persone come Senzo Meyiwa sono emerse da questa periferia per diventare

translation.en: and became not only warriors but heroes of millions of South African youth.
translation.it: sono emerse da questa periferia per diventare non solo guerrieri, ma anche eroi per milioni di giovani sudafricani.

translation.en: [Don Riddell] He was a very accomplished player, and he was really just entering
translation.it: Era un giocatore di talento e stava per cominciare una fase emozionante della sua carriera.

translation.en: a particularly exciting phase of his career.
translation.it: e stava per cominciare una fase emozionante della sua carriera.

translation.en: He'd only played six times for the national side,
translation.it: Aveva giocato solo 6 volte nella nazionale,

translation.en: known as Bafana Bafana in South Africa,
translation.it: conosciuta in Sudafrica come Bafana Bafana,

translation.en: and he was on the brink of leading them to the African Cup of Nations.
translation.it: e stava per condurla verso la Coppa delle nazioni africane.

translation.en: Obviously, I started as a striker.
translation.it: Quando ho iniziato, ero un attaccante.

translation.en: [in Zulu] I was a top striker.
translation.it: Ero un grande attaccante.

translation.en: [in English] No, I started as a striker. [in Zulu] We used to play using small poles in the township.
translation.it: Ho iniziato come attaccante. Giocavamo usando dei paletti.

translation.en: Then Pirates held trials in 2002.
translation.it: Nel 2002, i Pirates tennero delle selezioni.

translation.en: [in English] My parents didn't have money. They had to borrow money from neighbors.
translation.it: I miei genitori non avevano soldi e dovettero chiederli ai vicini.

translation.en: "My son is going for trials."
translation.it: Parteciperà alle selezioni.

translation.en: There was a lot of kids there.
translation.it: C'erano molti ragazzi.

translation.en: They gave you five minutes for the trials.
translation.it: Ti concedevano solo cinque minuti.

translation.en: So obviously, they must see something from you.
translation.it: Dovevano vedere qualcosa in te.

translation.en: Even if they don't come and shoot, what are you doing as a keeper in your goalposts?
translation.it: Anche se non cercano di fare goal, il portiere fa qualcosa in porta.

translation.en: I think I used that.
translation.it: Fu la mia tecnica.

translation.en: [Gleeson] Twenty years old. His first derby today.
translation.it: Vent'anni. È il suo primo derby.

translation.en: Even if I don't know the players, "Hey, come inside. Check man behind. Watch on your right shoulder."
translation.it: Anche se non conoscevo i giocatori, cercavo di dare consigli.

translation.en: [Gleeson] Meyiwa has even less experience then Khune.
translation.it: Meyiwa ha meno esperienza di Khune.

translation.en: [Senzo] You know, "Keeper's ball!"
translation.it: Reclamavo la palla.

translation.en: That's why I managed to-- to survive on those trials.
translation.it: Così riuscii a sopravvivere a quelle selezioni.

translation.en: I think keeping, it's something that…
translation.it: Era una cosa

translation.en: It was in me.
translation.it: che mi apparteneva.

translation.en: I'm the best keeper in the world.
translation.it: Sono il portiere migliore del mondo.

translation.en: [in English] If you want to communicate with us,
translation.it: LA MORTE DELLA STAR DEL CALCIO SCONVOLGE LE CELEBRITÀ LOCALI Chiamateci e raccontateci qual è stata la vostra reazione.

translation.en: and obviously, tonight it's a big one. What's your reaction to this?
translation.it: Chiamateci e raccontateci qual è stata la vostra reazione.

translation.en: [caller 1, in Zulu] This Senzo thing is too painful.
translation.it: La notizia di Senzo è dolorosa. CHIAMATE IN RADIO

translation.en: [caller 2] Senzo's story is not okay. Not at all.
translation.it: La storia di Senzo non ha alcun senso.

translation.en: [caller 3] We are heartbroken about Senzo!
translation.it: Abbiamo il cuore a pezzi per Senzo!

translation.en: He was so determined to play internationally one day,
translation.it: Voleva giocare a livello internazionale,

translation.en: for Barcelona, for Manchester United!
translation.it: per il Barcelona, per il Manchester United!

translation.en: [reporter, in English] And so this is the scene of the crime.
translation.it: Questa è la scena del crimine.

translation.en: This house here behind me, that's where Senzo Meyiwa was shot last night.
translation.it: Ieri sera, hanno sparato a Senzo Meyiwa in questa casa alle mie spalle.

translation.en: Three men came in, and they fired a shot that led to the death
translation.it: Tre uomini sono entrati e hanno sparato un colpo fatale

translation.en: of the South African national football captain.
translation.it: per il capitano della nazionale.

translation.en: [man, in English] I work for a Sunday publication.
translation.it: Lavoro per una rivista domenicale.

translation.en: My boss said,
translation.it: Il mio capo disse:

translation.en: "This story is of national interest. This is the national goalkeeper."
translation.it: "È di interesse nazionale. È il portiere della nazionale.

translation.en: "I want you guys to help with your skills, so we can get to the bottom of this."
translation.it: Voglio che usiate le vostre abilità per arrivare in fondo a questa storia".

translation.en: When the details started emerging
translation.it: Quando emersero i dettagli

translation.en: that it was inside the house and there were seven people inside the house,
translation.it: secondo cui era accaduto in casa e c'erano altre sette persone,

translation.en: I said, "We need to interview everyone who was in the house."
translation.it: decisi che dovevamo intervistare quelle persone.

translation.en: First it was Kelly Khumalo, who was his girlfriend.
translation.it: La prima fu Kelly Khumalo, la sua compagna.

translation.en: Kelly Khumalo's two kids.
translation.it: I due figli di Kelly Khumalo.

translation.en: Her sister, Zandie.
translation.it: Sua sorella, Zandie.

translation.en: Senzo's best friends,
translation.it: I migliori amici di Senzo

translation.en: as well as Longwe Twala, who was dating Zandie at the time.
translation.it: e Longwe Twala che, all'epoca, frequentava Zandie.

translation.en: And Kelly's mom.
translation.it: E la madre di Kelly.

translation.en: Kelly Khumalo is a well-known pop star in South Africa.
translation.it: Kelly Khumalo è una famosa pop star sudafricana.

translation.en: She said one thing very touching to me at the time.
translation.it: All'epoca, disse una cosa che mi commosse.

translation.en: She said, "He died in my arms."
translation.it: "È morto tra le mie braccia."

translation.en: [Kelly, in English] We're fighting the intruders…
translation.it: Opponemmo resistenza,

translation.en: and… gunshots.
translation.it: ma cominciarono a sparare.

translation.en: And then Senzo ran into my hands, I thought he was trying to protect me from these people,
translation.it: Poi, Senzo corse verso di me, pensavo volesse proteggermi,

translation.en: only to find out that he had been shot.
translation.it: ma mi resi conto che gli avevano sparato.

translation.en: It was very, very sad, and very… We were all touched.
translation.it: Era molto triste ed eravamo tutti commossi.

translation.en: [Kelly] And then when I held him, that's when I realized he had blood on his chest and on his back.
translation.it: Quando lo abbracciai, notai il sangue sul suo petto e sulla schiena.

translation.en: And then that's when I tried…
translation.it: E fu allora che provai…

translation.en: Everybody tried in the house to take him to the hospital, and we rushed.
translation.it: Cercammo di portarlo di corsa in ospedale.

translation.en: I prayed until I ran out of words to say. [crying]
translation.it: Pregai finché non esaurii le parole.

translation.en: [Kelly] First of all, I have never seen a gun,
translation.it: Innanzitutto, non ho mai visto una pistola,

translation.en: ever in my life.
translation.it: mai nella vita.

translation.en: So imagine what I was going through.
translation.it: Immaginate come possa essermi sentita.

translation.en: I have children in my house
translation.it: In casa, con i miei figli

translation.en: and I have my family in my house and there's these intruders in the house.
translation.it: e la mia famiglia, c'erano questi estranei.

translation.en: I… At some point, I forgot my children.
translation.it: All'inizio, mi dimenticai dei miei figli.

translation.en: That's what happened to me at that point, and when I came back to my senses,
translation.it: Ebbi un momento di confusione, ma quando mi ripresi,

translation.en: I remembered that, actually, I have children in the house.
translation.it: mi ricordai che c'erano i miei figli.

translation.en: And I wanted to protect my children. At the same time, I wanted to protect myself.
translation.it: Volevo proteggere i miei figli, ma volevo anche proteggere me stessa.

translation.en: So it was just a whole lot of things happening at once,
translation.it: Stavano succedendo tante cose tutte insieme,

translation.en: and very confusing,
translation.it: ero confusa

translation.en: and… and I felt so powerless,
translation.it: e mi sentivo impotente,

translation.en: because I'm always that person who wants to protect.
translation.it: perché, per natura, voglio sempre proteggere tutti.

translation.en: I'm always that person who wants to be there for the people who need me.
translation.it: Cerco sempre di esserci quando le persone hanno bisogno di me.

translation.en: But at that particular time, I just had to be there for myself.
translation.it: Ma in quel momento, dovevo esserci solo per me stessa.

translation.en: [Kelly] I had a performance that day in Soweto,
translation.it: Quel giorno, feci uno spettacolo a Soweto

translation.en: and for some reason,
translation.it: e, per qualche motivo,

translation.en: he had just decided that he wanted to spend the entire day with me.
translation.it: decise che voleva passare la giornata con me.

translation.en: And my sister was there.
translation.it: C'era anche mia sorella.

translation.en: And then we had invited another friend from KZN over.
translation.it: Avevamo invitato anche un amico di KwaZulu-Natal.

translation.en: So the friend called, and it was time for us to go pick him up,
translation.it: FOTO POSTATA ORE PRIMA DELLA MORTE DI SENZO Ci chiamò, perché dovevamo andare a prenderlo.

translation.en: so we picked him up.
translation.it: Ci chiamò, perché dovevamo andare a prenderlo.

translation.en: [in English] Yeah, I remember. I was waiting for them there.
translation.it: Sì, mi ricordo. Li stavo aspettando laggiù.

translation.en: Whenever I'm going to meet Senzo, I was always happy.
translation.it: Ero sempre felice di vedere Senzo,

translation.en: Because I knew we were going to party and have some drinks.
translation.it: perché sapevo che ci saremmo divertiti e avremmo bevuto.

translation.en: Senzo was my best friend. He was everything to me. He was like a brother.
translation.it: Senzo era il mio migliore amico, era come un fratello per me.

translation.en: He was like… he was like a family member.
translation.it: Era una persona di famiglia.

translation.en: [in Zulu] When we got to the house, Kelly's mom was there with the kids.
translation.it: Quando arrivammo alla casa, la mamma di Kelly era lì con i bambini.

translation.en: They prepared lunch together. It was Kelly's mom, Kelly, and Zandie.
translation.it: MADRE DI KELLY La madre di Kelly, Kelly e Zandie prepararono da mangiare.

translation.en: [in English] I don't even know where to start, hey.
translation.it: Non so da dove cominciare.

translation.en: Hmm…
translation.it: INTERVISTA RADIOFONICA - MAGGIO 2018

translation.en: [softly] Yeah.
translation.it: Già.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.it: Scusate.

translation.en: [Zandie, in Zulu] We shared a Sunday meal that my mother had prepared, as usual.
translation.it: Come ogni domenica, mia madre aveva cucinato per tutti.

translation.en: Around sunset, Longwe called to say he was coming over.
translation.it: Verso sera, Longwe chiamò per dire che stava venendo.

translation.en: I said no problem, because my mom had prepared food.
translation.it: Gli dissi che non c'era problema, perché mia madre aveva cucinato.

translation.en: [wa Afrika, in English] My understanding is that Longwe and Zandie, it was a fresh love.
translation.it: La storia tra Longwe e Zandie era appena nata.

translation.en: Longwe is the son of one of South Africa's most famous music producers,
translation.it: Longwe è il figlio del produttore musicale più famoso del Sudafrica,

translation.en: Kelly, at that time, she was recording an album at Chicco's house.
translation.it: All'epoca, Kelly stava incidendo un album a casa di Chicco.

translation.en: She used to go there with Zandie,
translation.it: Ci andava sempre con Zandie

translation.en: and, most of the time, Longwe was there at the house.
translation.it: e, molto spesso, in casa c'era anche Longwe.

translation.en: So, they met, fell in love, and they started dating.
translation.it: Si incontrarono, si innamorarono e iniziarono a frequentarsi.

translation.en: I came that day, innocently. I just came to pick Zandie up,
translation.it: Quel giorno, andai lì senza secondi fini. Andai solo a prendere Zandie,

translation.en: but then Zandie told me that their mother has cooked Sunday lunch.
translation.it: ma lei mi disse che la madre aveva preparato da mangiare.

translation.en: I loved Zandie at the time,
translation.it: Ero innamorato di Zandie

translation.en: you know, I wanted also a good reputation towards the mother and everything.
translation.it: e volevo fare una buona impressione sulla madre.

translation.en: So, you know, I stayed.
translation.it: Così, decisi di rimanere.

translation.en: [in Zulu] It all happened shortly before 9:00 p.m.
translation.it: Accadde tutto poco prima delle 21:00.

translation.en: Shortly before 9:00.
translation.it: Prima delle 21:00.

translation.en: [Tumelo, in Zulu] We were watching soccer.
translation.it: Guardavamo la partita.

translation.en: Chelsea was playing Manchester.
translation.it: Il Chelsea giocava contro il Manchester.

translation.en: Everyone was drinking that day.
translation.it: Tutti avevamo bevuto quel giorno.

translation.en: [in English] A bang at the door, and the door opened. And it was two guys.
translation.it: La porta si aprì con un colpo ed entrarono due uomini. SCENA DEL CRIMINE

translation.en: [Tumelo, in Zulu] That's when the man with the short dreads and hat came in.
translation.it: Fu allora che entrò un uomo con i dread e il cappello.

translation.en: He pointed a gun at us and demanded money and cellphones.
translation.it: Ci puntò una pistola contro e pretese soldi e cellulari.

translation.en: I couldn't believe it. I thought he was playing.
translation.it: Non riuscivo a crederci. Pensavo fosse uno scherzo.

translation.en: Until I saw everyone's reaction and realized it was serious.
translation.it: Ma quando vidi la reazione di tutti, capii che era vero.

translation.en: [in English] I was actually the first to stand up to try and protect everyone.
translation.it: Mi alzai per cercare di proteggere tutti.

translation.en: Not realizing that the other guy was… also had a gun, and pointed the gun at me.
translation.it: Non mi ero reso conto che l'altro tizio mi puntava una pistola contro.

translation.en: And I actually ran out.
translation.it: E scappai via.

translation.en: [in Zulu] He pushed the first guy and ran past the second guy.
translation.it: Spinse il primo uomo e superò il secondo.

translation.en: [in English] I wanted to go get help, but it was late.
translation.it: Volevo chiedere aiuto, ma era tardi.

translation.en: Neighbors and everyone was sleeping.
translation.it: I vicini stavano dormendo.

translation.en: I didn't have my phone, I left it at the house, so I couldn't call the cops.
translation.it: Il mio telefono era in casa e non potevo chiamare la polizia.

translation.en: [in Zulu] When we saw Longwe push him, everyone else jumped up.
translation.it: Quando Longwe lo spinse, tutti reagimmo.

translation.en: We tried to push both men towards the door.
translation.it: Cercammo di spingerli entrambi verso la porta.

translation.en: There was a scuffle back and forth.
translation.it: Ci fu una rissa.

translation.en: We were all in the kitchen fighting these people.
translation.it: Eravamo tutti in cucina a combattere.

translation.en: [Zandie] Next thing, the gun went off…
translation.it: Poi sentimmo un colpo di pistola.

translation.en: When I heard the gunshot, I ran into the bathroom.
translation.it: Quando sentii lo sparo, corsi in bagno.

translation.en: I ran and hid in the bedroom.
translation.it: Mi nascosi in camera da letto.

translation.en: The gunshot woke up Senzo's baby.
translation.it: Lo sparo svegliò la figlia di Senzo.

translation.en: I only realized when I came out of the room that Senzo had been shot.
translation.it: Solo quando uscii dalla stanza, mi resi conto che avevano sparato a Senzo.

translation.en: He was lying on the floor between the couch and the TV stand.
translation.it: Era steso sul pavimento tra il divano e il mobile della televisione.

translation.en: I called Senzo's name…
translation.it: Chiamai Senzo…

translation.en: then I started panicking and crying.
translation.it: poi, andai nel panico e cominciai a piangere.

translation.en: [in English] I never thought I would come here again.
translation.it: Non pensavo che sarei tornato qui.

translation.en: Just bring back the memories and stuff.
translation.it: Mi riporta alla mente troppo ricordi.

translation.en: [in English] We couldn't even wait for an ambulance to arrive,
translation.it: Non potevamo aspettare l'ambulanza,

translation.en: because for me, it felt like I would be giving up on him.
translation.it: perché, per me, era come arrendersi.

translation.en: [crying] I didn't want him to feel like I was giving up on him.
translation.it: E non volevo che pensasse che mi fossi arresa.

translation.en: [Kelly] I keep thinking about it.
translation.it: Ci penso di continuo.

translation.en: Why would somebody want to do that to such an amazing person?
translation.it: Perché fare una cosa del genere a una persona eccezionale?

translation.en: He was at the peak of his career. He was doing so…
translation.it: Era all'apice della sua carriera. Era così… NOVEMBRE 2015

translation.en: You don't understand how happy he was.
translation.it: Era al settimo cielo.

translation.en: He was extremely happy with himself,
translation.it: Era soddisfatto di se stesso,

translation.en: extremely comfortable with himself and his life.
translation.it: era sicuro di se stesso e della sua vita.

translation.en: How can somebody steal that away from him? From all of us.
translation.it: Perché hanno privato lui e noi di tutto questo?

translation.en: I pray to God that one day, we are able to find those people and justice is-- is served.
translation.it: Prego Dio che, un giorno, trovino quelle persone e che sia fatta giustizia.

translation.en: [woman 1, in English] Police say he was in a house with seven other people when it happened.
translation.it: Al momento del fatto, era in casa con altre sette persone.

translation.en: [woman 2] Meyiwa was the only person of the seven inside the house who was injured.
translation.it: Tra tutte le persone in casa, solo Meyiwa è stato ferito.

translation.en: [Marawa] But why him?
translation.it: Perché lui?

translation.en: It was sudden, it was gruesome, it was brutal.
translation.it: Fu improvviso, raccapricciante, brutale.

translation.en: It was final.
translation.it: Fu irrimediabile.

translation.en: You know? So people still had and held on to so many of the memories.
translation.it: La gente aveva e si aggrappava a tanti ricordi.

translation.en: So that is why people are still trying to piece it together.
translation.it: Per questo la gente cerca ancora di dargli un senso.

translation.en: What was the motive?
translation.it: Qual era il movente?

translation.en: It was difficult to know and to think, because there were so many different stories.
translation.it: Era difficile comprenderlo, perché c'erano tante versioni diverse.

translation.en: [man, in Zulu] They phoned me from the house when it happened.
translation.it: Quando accadde, mi chiamarono dalla casa.

translation.en: I gave the phone to my wife.
translation.it: Passai il telefono a mia moglie. Non capivo cosa dicessero.

translation.en: My wife asked "What's wrong?" I couldn't hear what they were saying.
translation.it: Passai il telefono a mia moglie. Non capivo cosa dicessero. FRATELLO MAGGIORE DI SENZO

translation.en: They said he's been shot. "Senzo's been shot."
translation.it: Dissero che avevano sparato a Senzo.

translation.en: Like it was an accident.
translation.it: Come se fosse stato un incidente.

translation.en: I kept asking, "How?"
translation.it: Continuavo a chiedere: "Come?"

translation.en: And they said, "It's true. He's been shot."
translation.it: E loro dissero che era tutto vero.

translation.en: [Tumelo] Some neighbors helped us get Senzo into the car.
translation.it: Dei vicini ci aiutarono a mettere Senzo in macchina.

translation.en: He was heavy.
translation.it: Era pesante.

translation.en: And Kelly was driving very fast.
translation.it: Kelly andava a tutta velocità.

translation.en: I was in the back, with Senzo's head on my lap.
translation.it: Io ero seduto dietro con la testa di Senzo in grembo.

translation.en: [Sifiso] I asked if he was alive.
translation.it: Chiesi se era ancora vivo.

translation.en: "He's alive. We're rushing him to the hospital."
translation.it: "È ancora vivo. Stiamo andando in ospedale."

translation.en: That's what they said.
translation.it: Non dissero altro.

translation.en: [Tumelo] I knew something was wrong.
translation.it: Sapevo che c'era qualcosa che non andava,

translation.en: because he'd stopped breathing.
translation.it: perché aveva smesso di respirare.

translation.en: [in English] At some point, I left the room where they were trying to resuscitate him, to pray,
translation.it: A un certo punto, uscii dalla stanza, in cui lo stavano rianimando, per pregare.

translation.en: and all I heard was my mother screaming at the top of her voice.
translation.it: Sentii mia madre urlare a squarciagola

translation.en: [sobs] And then I knew that…
translation.it: e capii

translation.en: he was gone.
translation.it: che era morto.

translation.en: [in Zulu] I said to him, "Senzo, did you bring me here to watch you die?"
translation.it: Gli dissi: "Senzo, mi hai portato qui per vederti morire?"

translation.en: I remember I kissed him on his forehead.
translation.it: Ricordo di averlo baciato sulla fronte.

translation.en: I didn't even notice everyone arriving.
translation.it: Non mi resi conto della gente che arrivava.

translation.en: [in English] Everyone was fighting, wanting to go and see Senzo,
translation.it: Tutti litigavano, volevano vedere Senzo,

translation.en: 'cause they didn't believe that Senzo was shot.
translation.it: perché nessuno riusciva a crederci.

translation.en: [in Zulu] When we got back to the house, the police were there.
translation.it: Quando tornammo a casa, c'era la polizia.

translation.en: [wa Afrika, in English] As a journalist, you know, you've got sources.
translation.it: Tutti i giornalisti hanno le loro fonti.

translation.en: And then you go to them and say, "Please, please, I'm begging,
translation.it: Vai da loro e le implori.

translation.en: if you know about this, please can I just have a look?"
translation.it: Chiedi informazioni e di poter dare un'occhiata.

translation.en: I was fortunate enough that I was shown the docket.
translation.it: Ebbi la fortuna di dare un'occhiata al verbale.

translation.en: There is one neighbor
translation.it: C'era una vicina

translation.en: who disposed an affidavit to say she ordered people to clean the house where Senzo was killed
translation.it: che dichiarò di aver ordinato di ripulire la casa in cui venne ucciso Senzo

translation.en: and throw away whatever they were drinking, because she didn't want people to see
translation.it: e buttare quello che avevano bevuto, perché non voleva che vedessero

translation.en: that Senzo died in a place where they were drinking.
translation.it: che era morto in un posto in cui avevano bevuto.

translation.en: And also, she didn't want people to see Senzo's blood.
translation.it: E non voleva che la gente vedesse il sangue di Senzo.

translation.en: [in English] If there is any allegation of the house
translation.it: Se c'è il sospetto che la casa

translation.en: being cleaned before
translation.it: sia stata ripulita

translation.en: the police arrived, it's tampering.
translation.it: prima dell'arrivo della polizia, la scena è considerata contaminata.

translation.en: You're supposed to be charging that person for defeating the ends of justice. Because that's-- that's exactly what it is.
translation.it: Quella persona dovrebbe essere accusata di intralcio alla giustizia.

translation.en: Where are the charges? Why are they not before the courts?
translation.it: Dove sono le accuse? Perché non è in tribunale?

translation.en: When we all arrived there, it was trampled upon already.
translation.it: Quando arrivammo, erano passati ovunque.

translation.en: Personally, we never found any bullet or empty cartridge.
translation.it: Noi, personalmente, non trovammo proiettili o cartucce vuote.

translation.en: Senzo's case was broken…
translation.it: Il caso di Senzo venne compromesso

translation.en: at that crime scene.
translation.it: su quella scena del crimine.

translation.en: [in English] If the house was cleaned, what about the hat?
translation.it: Se la casa era stata pulita, perché il cappello era lì?

translation.en: Because that guy who entered the house,
translation.it: FOTO NUMERO 005 L'uomo che era entrato indossava un cappello e aveva i dread.

translation.en: was wearing a hat with the short dreads.
translation.it: L'uomo che era entrato indossava un cappello e aveva i dread.

translation.en: So obviously, it belongs to him.
translation.it: Apparteneva sicuramente a lui.

translation.en: If the house was cleaned when we came back from hospital, what about the hat?
translation.it: FOTO NUMERO 012 Perché il cappello era lì se la casa era stata ripulita?

translation.en: [in Zulu] I'm not saying if it was cleaned or not, but the hat was found on the floor, right?
translation.it: Non so se fosse stata ripulita, ma il cappello era sul pavimento.

translation.en: So why didn't the person who cleaned remove the hat?
translation.it: Perché la persona che pulì non tolse il cappello?

translation.en: [Khoza] We want to indicate that as Orlando Pirates Football Club,
translation.it: Tutto l'Orlando Pirates Football Club

translation.en: we are devastated.
translation.it: è devastato.

translation.en: I said to the players, it's only fair that you must cry.
translation.it: Ho detto ai giocatori che è giusto piangere…

translation.en: Because it's not easy to hold back emotions,
translation.it: perché non è facile trattenere le emozioni…

translation.en: especially on an event
translation.it: PROPRIETARIO DELL'ORLANDO PIRATES …soprattutto in circostanze come questa.

translation.en: like this one.
translation.it: …soprattutto in circostanze come questa.

translation.en: [Sifiso, in Zulu] Senzo was shot on the Sunday.
translation.it: La domenica, spararono a Senzo.

translation.en: I left for Johannesburg on the Tuesday.
translation.it: Il martedì, partii per Johannesburg.

translation.en: I went to choose a coffin.
translation.it: Andai a scegliere una bara.

translation.en: The funeral was going to be paid for by Irvin.
translation.it: Irvin avrebbe pagato le spese del funerale.

translation.en: [wa Afrika, in English] Irvin Khoza is one of the most powerful soccer administrators in South Africa.
translation.it: Irvin Khoza è uno dei dirigenti sportivi più potenti del Sudafrica.

translation.en: We can say that he's the boss of South African soccer.
translation.it: In un certo senso, è il boss del calcio sudafricano.

translation.en: He's very good as an administrator.
translation.it: È un ottimo dirigente.

translation.en: [Khoza] For every nook and cranny, there's a football supporter.
translation.it: In ogni angolo, c'è un tifoso di calcio.

translation.en: So I'm saying that we're all supporters in this country.
translation.it: Quindi, in questo Paese, siamo tutti tifosi.

translation.en: Every corner of this country,
translation.it: Ogni persona di questo Paese

translation.en: let them help us.
translation.it: ci aiuterà.

translation.en: Because we don't want to speculate.
translation.it: Perché non vogliamo speculare.

translation.en: We want to know who killed Senzo. Later on, we'll know why.
translation.it: Vogliamo sapere chi ha ucciso Senzo. Più in là, scopriremo perché.

translation.en: [Sifiso, in Zulu] What I heard about the night Senzo got shot
translation.it: Mi dissero che, la notte in cui spararono a Senzo,

translation.en: is there was someone who was passing by.
translation.it: una persona passò nei pressi della casa.

translation.en: I won't mention the person's name.
translation.it: Non dirò il suo nome.

translation.en: He heard the gunshots and hid.
translation.it: Sentì gli spari e si nascose.

translation.en: He hid for more than two hours watching Kelly's home,
translation.it: Si nascose per più di due ore e rimase a osservare la casa di Kelly.

translation.en: and didn't see any intruders exiting the gate.
translation.it: Non vide nessun estraneo uscire.

translation.en: It didn't happen.
translation.it: Non era successo.

translation.en: No robbers entered that house.
translation.it: Nessun ladro era entrato in quella casa.

translation.en: Senzo… was shot by someone in the house.
translation.it: Qualcuno che si trovava in casa aveva sparato a Senzo.

translation.en: [Masechaba Ndlovu, in English] Who do you think killed your son?
translation.it: Secondo lei, chi ha ucciso suo figlio?

translation.en: [in Zulu] The person who killed Senzo
translation.it: Senzo è stato ucciso…

translation.en: was one of those in the house.
translation.it: PADRE DI SENZO INTERVISTA RADIOFONICA …da una delle persone in casa.

translation.en: That boy, Tumelo Madlala, was there.
translation.it: Quel tizio, Tumelo Madlala, era lì.

translation.en: To be honest, I was angry with Tumelo.
translation.it: Sinceramente, ero arrabbiata con Tumelo. Sono ancora arrabbiata con lui.

translation.en: I'm still angry at him.
translation.it: MADRE DI SENZO

translation.en: Tumelo was there when Senzo was shot on the Sunday.
translation.it: Tumelo era lì, quella domenica, quando spararono a Senzo.

translation.en: He only came back from Johannesburg on Thursday.
translation.it: Tornò da Johannesburg il giovedì.

translation.en: Only then did he come to us.
translation.it: Solo allora venne da noi.

translation.en: [Tumelo, in Zulu] I was still there because I was waiting for my phone.
translation.it: Ero ancora lì, perché aspettavo il telefono.

translation.en: The police took our phones that day in Vosloorus.
translation.it: La polizia prese i nostri telefoni quel giorno a Vosloorus.

translation.en: If I didn't stay at Kelly's, where I was initially visiting,
translation.it: Se non fossi rimasto da Kelly, dove ero in visita,

translation.en: where was I going to stay?
translation.it: dove sarei potuto andare?

translation.en: Where was I going to stay?
translation.it: Dove sarei potuto andare?

translation.en: Everyone in the house was crying.
translation.it: Tutti in casa piangevano.

translation.en: Kelly would lock herself in the bedroom the whole day.
translation.it: Kelly rimaneva in camera tutto il giorno.

translation.en: It wasn't pleasant in the house.
translation.it: Non fu piacevole.

translation.en: [Sifiso] Tumelo said Senzo was shot accidentally.
translation.it: Tumelo disse che spararono a Senzo per sbaglio.

translation.en: That's what he said. Senzo was shot by mistake.
translation.it: Disse che avevano sparato a Senzo per sbaglio.

translation.en: Surely if I call you, the first thing you would say is,
translation.it: Se ti chiamassi, la prima cosa che diresti sarebbe:

translation.en: "Robbers came in and shot your brother."
translation.it: "Sono entrati i ladri e hanno sparato a tuo fratello".

translation.en: Instead they made it sound like it was an accident.
translation.it: Invece, lo fecero sembrare un incidente.

translation.en: They said, "He's been shot."
translation.it: Dissero: "Gli hanno sparato".

translation.en: [Tumelo, in Zulu] People believe I know something. That I'm being paid by someone.
translation.it: La gente pensa che io sappia qualcosa, che qualcuno mi abbia pagato.

translation.en: Many things have been said about me on the radio. Especially by Senzo's family.
translation.it: In radio, hanno detto molte cose su di me. Soprattutto la famiglia di Senzo.

translation.en: Senzo's family is dealing with a wound, but I have that wound too.
translation.it: La famiglia di Senzo sta soffrendo, ma sto soffrendo anche io.

translation.en: That empty space they feel, I feel it too.
translation.it: Quel vuoto che sentono, lo sento anche io.

translation.en: [Sifiso] Tumelo is a long-time friend of Senzo.
translation.it: Tumelo è un vecchio amico di Senzo.

translation.en: He was a few grades ahead at school.
translation.it: Era qualche anno più avanti a scuola.

translation.en: They were best friends.
translation.it: Erano migliori amici.

translation.en: [Sifiso] That's what is confusing me.
translation.it: È questo che mi confonde.

translation.en: I don't understand why they would lie.
translation.it: Non capisco perché dovrebbero mentire.

translation.en: I know this is a cover-up.
translation.it: So che è una copertura.

translation.en: I'm confused about why they won't speak up.
translation.it: Non capisco perché non parlino.

translation.en: Maybe they were threatened.
translation.it: Forse vennero minacciati.

translation.en: This thing just brings me pain.
translation.it: Provo un immenso dolore.

translation.en: [man, in Zulu] It's a video, no pictures.
translation.it: È un video, non una foto.

translation.en: [Tumelo, in Zulu] This is where Senzo was building his dream house.
translation.it: Qui Senzo stava costruendo la casa dei suoi sogni.

translation.en: It's been a long time, but we went there often.
translation.it: È passato tanto tempo, ma ci venivamo spesso.

translation.en: My heart breaks when I see this place.
translation.it: Vedere questo posto mi spezza il cuore.

translation.en: [Riah Phiyega, in English] We have put forward a reward.
translation.it: Abbiamo previsto una ricompensa.

translation.en: This reward is on offer for any information
translation.it: È un'offerta per qualsiasi informazione… COMMISSARIO DELLA POLIZIA NAZIONALE

translation.en: that could lead to the arrest and conviction of the perpetrators.
translation.it: …che potrebbe condurre all'arresto e alla condanna dei colpevoli.

translation.en: We believe that someone,
translation.it: Siamo convinti che qualcuno,

translation.en: somewhere,
translation.it: da qualche parte,

translation.en: somehow,
translation.it: in qualche modo,

translation.en: knows something about this crime.
translation.it: sappia qualcosa su questo crimine.

translation.en: And we appeal to that person to come forward, talk to us as the police,
translation.it: Chiediamo a quella persona di farsi avanti, di parlare con la polizia,

translation.en: so that we can really do justice to this investigation.
translation.it: per permetterci di rendere giustizia a questa indagine.

translation.en: [woman, in Afrikaans] I got a call
translation.it: Ricevetti una telefonata,

translation.en: from my national coordinator the morning after the murder.
translation.it: la mattina dell'omicidio, dal mio coordinatore nazionale.

translation.en: She said she needed my services.
translation.it: Disse che aveva bisogno della mia assistenza.

translation.en: [in English] I'm Amanda Yvonne Steenkamp.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Amanda Yvonne Steenkamp.

translation.en: I'm a retired police officer in the facial identification unit.
translation.it: Sono un agente in pensione dell'Unità Riconoscimento Facciale.

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] I asked to speak to the witnesses individually.
translation.it: Chiesi di parlare con ogni testimone singolarmente.

translation.en: It's better because they can't confuse or influence one another.
translation.it: Chiesi di parlare con ogni testimone singolarmente. È meglio, perché non si confondono o non si influenzano a vicenda.

translation.en: I can remember the first person I interviewed was Kelly Khumalo.
translation.it: Ricordo di aver interrogato per prima Kelly Khumalo.

translation.en: [in English] She compiled the face of the person who entered the premises first.
translation.it: Fornì l'identikit della persona che era entrata per prima.

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] She pointed out the eyes, she remembered. The nose was very narrow.
translation.it: Ricordava molto bene gli occhi. Aveva il naso sottile.

translation.en: He had thin lips.
translation.it: Le labbra sottili.

translation.en: She remembered he was wearing a hat.
translation.it: Ricordava che indossava un cappello.

translation.en: Next, I interviewed her sister.
translation.it: Poi, intervistai la sorella.

translation.en: She said that the hat fell off, showing his dreadlocks.
translation.it: Disse che il cappello cadde mostrando dei dread

translation.en: Behind, medium length.
translation.it: di lunghezza media.

translation.en: [in English] One has been described as tall and slender with dreadlocks.
translation.it: Uno è stato descritto come alto e snello con i dread.

translation.en: The other is short and well-built.
translation.it: L'altro è basso e robusto.

translation.en: The reward for information has been increased to 250,000,
translation.it: La ricompensa per le informazioni è stata portata a 250.000.

translation.en: and anyone with information has been asked to call Crime Stop.
translation.it: Chiunque sappia qualcosa è pregato di chiamare Crime Stop.

translation.en: [man, in English] A man has been arrested in connection
translation.it: CINQUE GIORNI DOPO L'OMICIDIO 31 OTTOBRE 2014 Un uomo è stato arrestato per l'omicidio del capitano dei Bafana Bafana, Senzo Meyiwa.

translation.en: with the murder of Bafana Bafana captain Senzo Meyiwa.
translation.it: per l'omicidio del capitano dei Bafana Bafana, Senzo Meyiwa.

translation.en: The suspect, who cannot be named until he appears in court…
translation.it: Il sospettato, il cui nome verrà rivelato…

translation.en: [man, in English] There is a robbery that has taken place and there is a person that was killed
translation.it: Ha avuto luogo una rapina ed è stata uccisa una persona,

translation.en: and therefore they will be charged for… murder and robbery.
translation.it: quindi verranno accusati di omicidio e rapina.

translation.en: [man, in English] The suspect was apparently pointed out at an identity parade
translation.it: Il sospettato è stato identificato durante un confronto

translation.en: and linked to the crime that occurred at the Vosloorus home
translation.it: e collegato al crimine avvenuto nella casa della madre della cantante Kelly Khumalo

translation.en: of the mother of singer Kelly Khumalo.
translation.it: e collegato al crimine avvenuto nella casa della madre della cantante Kelly Khumalo a Vosloorus.

translation.en: [in Zulu] He's hurt the entire nation of South Africa.
translation.it: Ha ferito l'intero Sudafrica.

translation.en: Not just Pirates fans. Everyone is hurt.
translation.it: Non solo i fan del Pirates. Siamo tutti feriti.

translation.en: We don't want them arrested, we want them executed.
translation.it: Vogliamo che vengano giustiziati.

translation.en: [woman] They must all be killed.
translation.it: Devono morire.

translation.en: [woman, in English] The family of the alleged perpetrator
translation.it: La famiglia del presunto colpevole

translation.en: believes their family member is innocent.
translation.it: è fermamente convinta che sia innocente.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Stop your nonsense. I told you to leave her alone.
translation.it: Basta sciocchezze. Ti ho detto di lasciarla in pace.

translation.en: [woman, in English] They raised questions about the identikit.
translation.it: Hanno fatto domande sull'identikit.

translation.en: [woman] Do you believe that you have the right person?
translation.it: Credete davvero che sia la persona giusta?

translation.en: We are sure that the person that we have now charged
translation.it: Siamo sicuri che la persona che abbiamo accusato

translation.en: is one of the suspects that were involved in the incident.
translation.it: sia uno dei sospettati coinvolti nel fatto.

translation.en: [man, in English] …submissions made by it…
translation.it: 3 SETTIMANE DOPO L'OMICIDIO 11 NOVEMBRE 2014

translation.en: The National Prosecuting Authority is informing the nation is informing the nation
translation.it: La National Prosecuting Authority informa la nazione

translation.en: that, as of now,
translation.it: che, al momento,

translation.en: there is no sufficient evidential material to put Mr. Mbatha to trial.
translation.it: non ci sono abbastanza materiali probatori per sottoporre a giudizio il sig. Mbatha.

translation.en: This court orders the immediate release
translation.it: Questa corte ordina il rilascio immediato

translation.en: of the accused Zamokuhle Mbatha from detention.
translation.it: di Zamokuhle Mbatha, perché non colpevole.

translation.en: The accused had been identified in an identification parade by two persons.
translation.it: Due persone hanno identificato l'accusato durante un confronto.

translation.en: Subsequent to that, more information came to light.
translation.it: In seguito, sono emerse altre informazioni.

translation.en: Information that was inconsistent with the identification parade.
translation.it: Informazioni incoerenti con il confronto.

translation.en: [in English] Apparently, he was the poor guy who was washing Senzo's car.
translation.it: A quanto pare, era la persona che stava lavando l'auto di Senzo.

translation.en: [Zamokuhle, in Zulu] They came to my home.
translation.it: Vennero a casa mia.

translation.en: And accused me of doing it.
translation.it: Mi accusarono dell'omicidio.

translation.en: I didn't know how to respond. Anything I said, they took as a lie.
translation.it: Non sapevo come rispondere. Ogni mia parola era una bugia per loro.

translation.en: I was traumatized over something I didn't do.
translation.it: Ero sconvolto per qualcosa che non avevo fatto.

translation.en: After what happened, my life changed.
translation.it: Dopo, la mia vita cambiò totalmente.

translation.en: People believed I was guilty.
translation.it: Dopo, la mia vita cambiò totalmente. La gente credeva che fossi colpevole.

translation.en: I was afraid to leave my home. I locked myself inside.
translation.it: Avevo paura di uscire. Mi chiusi in casa.

translation.en: I couldn't look for a job.
translation.it: Non potevo cercare lavoro.

translation.en: I can't tell you how traumatized I was.
translation.it: Fu un vero trauma.

translation.en: [Tumelo, in Zulu] When we went to the ID parade,
translation.it: Quando andammo al confronto,

translation.en: it was me, Kelly, and Kelly's mother.
translation.it: c'eravamo io, Kelly e la madre di Kelly.

translation.en: It was all over the newspapers.
translation.it: Era su tutti i giornali.

translation.en: I didn't even know that Zamo. I don't know where he's from.
translation.it: Non conoscevo quello Zamo. Non sapevo da dove venisse.

translation.en: The person who pointed him out was Kelly's mother.
translation.it: Fu la madre di Kelly a indicarlo.

translation.en: [in English] Kelly Khumalo, her sister, her mom,
translation.it: Kelly Khumalo, la sorella, la madre,

translation.en: didn't tell the police that, "Sorry, but we know this guy."
translation.it: non dissero alla polizia di conoscerlo.

translation.en: They allowed police to arrest this innocent guy.
translation.it: Permisero alla polizia di arrestare un innocente.

translation.en: Now Zamokuhle is suing police. I think it's about 17 million for wrongful arrest.
translation.it: Zamokuhle farà causa alla polizia, per 17 milioni, per arresto illegale

translation.en: And I believe that he should also sue the people in the house,
translation.it: e dovrebbe fare causa anche alle persone che erano in casa,

translation.en: actually the people who pointed him out at the identity parade.
translation.it: nello specifico, alle persone che lo indicarono durante il confronto.

translation.en: [caller, in English] The people who can tell us what happened exactly, it's the people who were there at the day of the event.
translation.it: Solo le persone che erano lì quel giorno possono dirci cos'è successo esattamente.

translation.en: [caller 2] Kelly Khumalo and the South African police
translation.it: CHIAMATE IN RADIO Kelly Khumalo e la polizia devono essere ritenute responsabili.

translation.en: need to be held accountable.
translation.it: Kelly Khumalo e la polizia devono essere ritenute responsabili.

translation.en: Kelly Khumalo knows a lot.
translation.it: Kelly Khumalo sa molte cose.

translation.en: [Steenkamp, in English] When I interviewed Kelly,
translation.it: Quando interrogai Kelly,

translation.en: she was totally uninvolved with me.
translation.it: era assolutamente distaccata.

translation.en: No eye contact.
translation.it: Nessun contatto visivo.

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] She sat like this.
translation.it: Era seduta così.

translation.en: She looked very tired and irritated.
translation.it: Sembrava stufa e infastidita.

translation.en: It was like, "Oh, just get over it."
translation.it: Come se avesse solo voluto farla finita.

translation.en: As a policeman, I draw my own conclusions.
translation.it: Ero una poliziotta, quindi trassi le mie conclusioni.

translation.en: I realized… [in English] …something is just fishy here.
translation.it: Mi resi conto che qualcosa non quadrava.

translation.en: [in English] Her eyes.
translation.it: I suoi occhi.

translation.en: Eyes… talk a lot.
translation.it: Gli occhi dicono molto.

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] My sixth sense told me… there is a story behind this story.
translation.it: Il mio sesto senso mi fece intuire che c'era una storia dietro quella storia.

translation.en: [in English] Something is wrong.
translation.it: Qualcosa non andava.

translation.en: [wa Afrika, in English] According to the statement of the people who were in the house,
translation.it: Secondo le persone che erano in casa,

translation.en: they claim that when the gunmen walked into the house…
translation.it: quando gli uomini armati entrarono,

translation.en: They spoke in Zulu, they said… [in Zulu] "Bring your cellphones."
translation.it: parlarono in zulù, dissero di dargli i cellulari.

translation.en: But none of their cellphones were taken.
translation.it: Ma nessun cellulare venne preso

translation.en: Only one cellphone that belonged to Kelly was taken.
translation.it: tranne quello che apparteneva a Kelly.

translation.en: The cellphone, according to the police investigation,
translation.it: Secondo le indagini, il cellulare venne portato in un ostello vicino Vosloorus

translation.en: was taken to a hostel which is near by Vosloorus.
translation.it: il cellulare venne portato in un ostello vicino Vosloorus

translation.en: -That's where it was switched off. -[siren wailing]
translation.it: e venne spento lì.

translation.en: [man] How are you feeling, Kelly?
translation.it: Come stai, Kelly?

translation.en: We don't know why that particular cellphone was a target of the gunmen.
translation.it: Non sappiamo perché gli uomini armati volessero proprio quel cellulare. LA POLIZIA ESAMINA I TABULATI TELEFONICI DI KELLY KHUMALO

translation.en: In that docket there is two affidavits by the Khumalos' direct neighbor.
translation.it: Nel fascicolo ci sono due dichiarazioni del vicino dei Khumalo.

translation.en: He's a retired police officer. Him and his son saw something.
translation.it: È un agente di polizia in pensione. Lui e il figlio videro qualcosa.

translation.en: [man, in Zulu] I was sitting with my wife and we heard something strange.
translation.it: Ero seduto con mia moglie e sentimmo dei rumori strani.

translation.en: It sounded like people were pushing each other.
translation.it: Sembravano delle persone che si stavano spingendo. VICINO

translation.en: My wife said, "Something's happening next door."
translation.it: Mia moglie disse: "Sta succedendo qualcosa".

translation.en: [wa Afrika, in English] And that's when the former police officer took out his whistle,
translation.it: E fu allora che l'ex poliziotto tirò fuori il suo fischietto

translation.en: which is a sign in the township that there's trouble here.
translation.it: che, in periferia, viene usato in caso di pericolo.

translation.en: He blew the whistle and all the neighbors came out.
translation.it: Fischiò e tutti i vicini uscirono.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Kelly's child was there. The young boy.
translation.it: Il figlio di Kelly era lì. Il bambino.

translation.en: I think he was there when all this happened,
translation.it: Forse era lì al momento del fatto,

translation.en: because he was crying so much. My wife brought him here.
translation.it: perché piangeva disperato. Mia moglie lo portò qui.

translation.en: That child saw something terrible. She brought him here to rest.
translation.it: Aveva visto qualcosa di terribile. Lei lo portò qui per tranquillizzarlo.

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] A child can give valuable information.
translation.it: Un bambino può dare informazioni preziose.

translation.en: Even if only a small piece of the puzzle.
translation.it: Anche solo un piccolo pezzo del puzzle.

translation.en: It can help towards a breakthrough.
translation.it: Può aiutare a dare una svolta.

translation.en: [in English] I wanted to interview Kelly's little boy.
translation.it: Volevo interrogare il bambino di Kelly.

translation.en: Kelly said, "No, no, it is too traumatizing for the child."
translation.it: Kelly si rifiutò, perché era troppo traumatico per lui.

translation.en: But surely you should be helping us understand what happened.
translation.it: Ma dovresti aiutarci a capire cos'è successo.

translation.en: South Africans believe that she owes the nation at least an answer,
translation.it: I sudafricani credono che debba alla nazione una risposta

translation.en: if not a lead.
translation.it: o un indizio.

translation.en: So that is the only thing South Africans are left with, to make their own judgment.
translation.it: Non rimane altro, ai sudafricani, per esprimere un giudizio.

translation.en: [chanting in Zulu] Kelly is a dog! Kelly is a dog!
translation.it: Kelly è una bastarda!

translation.en: [in English] If you have something to say, if you have evidence on-- on Senzo's passing,
translation.it: Se avete qualcosa da dire se avete prove sulla morte di Senzo,

translation.en: why don't you approach the police station or the investigating officers
translation.it: perché non andate dalla polizia o dagli investigatori

translation.en: that are in charge of the case,
translation.it: che si occupano del caso,

translation.en: instead of dragging me down just because I'm in the public eye?
translation.it: invece di trascinarmi nel fango solo perché sono famosa?

translation.en: I-- I was a victim on that night. And I'm not here to defend myself.
translation.it: Anche io ero una vittima e non sono qui per difendermi.

translation.en: The law will do that.
translation.it: Ci penserà la legge.
